text: Nihsandeha ti manisaharu ghatama parihale juna aphno santanala'i murkhata ra ajnanatako karanale hatya gare ra allahamathi mithya kuragarda usale pradana gareko jivikala'i varjita bana'e. Vastavama tiniharu pathavicalita bha'ihale ra kahile pani uniharu satya margadarsana prapta garnemadhyeka hune chainan
